Summary: 5 orange orb/lights appear out of nowhere all november around 7:30pm
divs: sighting detailson november 11th at 7:30pm in goodyear az i got a call from a relative saying there were lights in the sky. me and the rest of the family who were visiting went up to the master bedroom and looked out the window looking east to phoneix and just over the furthest street lamps i could see were 5 orange glowing orb\lights over phx around the south mtn area in a cresent shape. they just stayed there and didnt move and didnt make any sound. when i first looked at them it was obvious to me that helicopters made a mad rush over to investigate them for about 15 min and then moved away but stayed around flying back and forth around them. once and a while one of the lights would get very very bright and then dim again all without moving. these lights were not falling they were stationary and the same amount of space apart. eventually they went out one by one in no kind of pattern. after this i continued to see these same lights all of the month of november. it seems like every other week i still see them on occasion and if you want to see them just come out to goodyear and look east at around 7:30 pm. -------------------------------------------------------------------------- if an investigator would like to come view the video please contact me. i cannot send through email because the file is too large. come view it and i will be happy to make you a dvd copy if you like. you can come out also and investigate via the window anytime, it really is the perfect vantage point. the reason i am not posting the video here is because the audio is my hysterical family and is quite imbarrasing. i would also like to add that these pictures i am posting were taken behind my bedroom window so you may see a reflection of a cell phone as my mother was next to me filming via cell but the 5 stationary lights are the ufo sighting.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Goodyear
There were no other sightings in Goodyear on or around November 11th 2011
